FACT: The #cannabis genome produces a total of 200 types of #terpenes, about 150 different #cannabinoids (like #CBD + #THC), and 20 #flavonoids. 

All three categories have demonstrated anti-#cancer efficacy. Want to learn more? https://t.co/SQ1IF7GVG4
